name: GreyNoise
description: GreyNoise is a cybersecurity platform that collects and analyzes Internet-wide scan and attack traffic. With this integration, users can contextualize existing alerts, filter false-positives, identify compromised devices, and track emerging threats. The full integration code can be found here: https://github.com/demisto/content/tree/master/Packs/GreyNoise
author: GreyNoise
